The unit marked 'MR-5' stopped responding to commands during final trials.
Swift recovery of the rogue unit will be rewarded.

robo racing:
SENDER: GREEK FIRE
SUBJECT: INVESTIGATIVE ATHLETE CALLS
The world of robo-racing is full of money. The primary source of which
being the vast gambling consortiums. Robo-racer Gronge 'Furious fins'
Yalec has approached the racing authority with claims of match fixing.
You have created a shell corpfor gambling fraud investigation. Discover
the truth of their claims and you shall recieve a legal payout.

REWARD:

4000 HWL - Ombudsman contract

4000 HWL - Completed investigations with full report

SECTOR: 1210
'HELA'
Contains Kardakouk, homeworld of the concord of mutual distain. Well
known for cuisine and leisure. Many moons and stations. Have fun
